
Linear regression model analysis and POD
========================================

.. code:: python

    import openturns as ot
    import otpod
    %matplotlib inline

Generate data
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. code:: python

    N = 100
    ot.RandomGenerator.SetSeed(0)
    defectDist = ot.Uniform(0.1, 0.6)
    epsilon = ot.Normal(0, 1.9)
    defects = defectDist.getSample(N)
    signalsInvBoxCox = defects * 43. + epsilon.getSample(N) + 2.5
    invBoxCox = ot.InverseBoxCoxTransform(0.3)
    signals = invBoxCox(signalsInvBoxCox)

Run analysis
~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. code:: python

    analysis = otpod.UnivariateLinearModelAnalysis(defects, signals, boxCox=True)

Print results of the linear regression and all tests on the residuals
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. code:: python

    analysis.printResults()


.. parsed-literal::

    --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             Linear model analysis results
    --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    Box Cox parameter :                                    0.28              
                                                                             
                                                     Uncensored              
                                                                             
    Intercept coefficient :                                2.51              
    Slope coefficient :                                   38.57              
    Standard error of the estimate :                       1.87              
                                                                             
    Confidence interval on coefficients                                      
    Intercept coefficient :                        [1.49, 3.53]              
    Slope coefficient :                           [36.01, 41.13]              
    Level :                                                0.95              
                                                                             
    Quality of regression                                                    
    R2 (> 0.8):                                             0.9              
    --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             Residuals analysis results
    --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    Fitted distribution (uncensored) :            Normal(mu = 2.64677e-15, sigma = 1.86186)              
                                                                             
                                                     Uncensored              
    Distribution fitting test                                                
    Kolmogorov p-value (> 0.05):                           0.84              
                                                                             
    Normality test                                                           
    Anderson Darling p-value (> 0.05):                     0.46              
    Cramer Von Mises p-value (> 0.05):                     0.45              
                                                                             
    Zero residual mean test                                                  
    p-value (> 0.05):                                       1.0              
                                                                             
    Homoskedasticity test (constant variance)                                
    Breush Pagan p-value (> 0.05):                         0.73              
    Harrison McCabe p-value (> 0.05):                      0.03              
                                                                             
    Non autocorrelation test                                                 
    Durbin Watson p-value (> 0.05):                        0.57              
    --------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Print graphs
------------

The linear regression model with data
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. code:: python

    fig, ax = analysis.drawLinearModel()
    fig.show()



.. image:: examples/_files/examples/_9_0.png


The residuals with respect to the defects
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. code:: python

    fig, ax = analysis.drawResiduals()
    fig.show()



.. image:: examples/_files/examples/_11_0.png


The fitted residuals distribution with the histogram
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. code:: python

    fig, ax = analysis.drawResidualsDistribution()
    fig.show()



.. image:: examples/_files/examples/_13_0.png


The residuals QQ plot
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. code:: python

    fig, ax = analysis.drawResidualsQQplot()
    fig.show()



.. image:: examples/_files/examples/_15_0.png


The Box Cox likelihood with respect to the defect
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. code:: python

    fig, ax = analysis.drawBoxCoxLikelihood()
    fig.show()



.. image:: examples/_files/examples/_17_0.png
